pageTitle: Holidays in Costa Rica | Costa Rica Family Holiday
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {38240=This unique cycling raid is a must-do route for any road cycling fan. It will take us on a journey over eleven of the most famous Cols in the Pyrenees. Departs: 15th August 2015, 29774=Explore the spectacular wilderness at the southern end of the world. Departs: Sat 17 Oct. 2015, 18223=Stunning Croatian islands and the historic cities of Split, Trogir and Dubrovnik. Departs: 20 September 2015., 159522=I was surprised how few mosquitos we encountered, I believe the fact we chose to go to Costa Rica at the beginning of the dry season, which starts at the end of December, was an advantageous factor. So if you worry about mosquitos, choose a tour during the dry season. Use DEET or Incognito Insect repellent, wear long sleeves and long trousers and you will be fine. The sun is much more powerful than in the Mediterranean, therefore caution and moderation are needed on the tropical beaches of Manuel Antonio, not just suncream!, 30602=Exclusive photographic charter in the Svalbard Archipelago accompanied by Paul Goldstein and Mark Carwardine. Departs: 22 June and 3 July 2016, 17430=Enjoy the best of Vietnam on two wheels. Departs: 22 August 2015 (Land only: 23 August 2015).}
textBeforeTable: Trip Notes These are ‘land only’ prices which require you to book your own flights and join the rest of the group on Day 1 of the trip. For more information please see Excluding flights Dates & prices We hope you enjoy using the Departure Lounge to meet your fellow travellers and continue to contribute right up to the start of your journey with Exodus. Please note: there might be slight a delay before your post/comment appears as intended because we moderate what is published on the website. When viewing the Forum area of the website, as you scroll through the 'Rooms' which are set out by 'travel months' during the current year within the Departure Lounge. You can then select the 'month' of intended travel, then filter the list of trips that have already been created by fellow travellers to see if your trip is listed. If the trip you are travelling on is not in the list, you can start the process by clicking on the 'Post new forum topic' link above the list on the same page. If you do see your trip within the list, select it to view the 'discussion' by your fellow travellers and you can join in by completing the 'Post
